entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:38 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -12.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -12.3°C
Pressure: 100.0 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -15.7°C
Wind: SW 48 km/h gust 67 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow in the morning. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
